name: Checkout Smoke Tests - New User Purchase Journeys

elements.name: User registers and makes a purchase

steps.name: I search for a product code
I add the product to the bag
I dismiss the add to bag confirmation modal

steps.name: I proceed to checkout from the "minibag"
I choose "Home Express" as the delivery option
I enter my credit card details
I accept the terms and conditions
I see the confirmation for my order
